message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm starting the negotiations at $2,300,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit on this deal.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $1,200,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $2,000,000. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.

I'm still interested in the product, but $2,000,000 is not a good fit for my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer, so I'm thinking of $1,100,000. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any lower.
